node.title: Covid-19: New locations of interest in Bay of Plenty
node.description: There are 35 new locations of interest today, including bars and nightclubs in Mount Maunganui, and reports of a case in Hawke's Bay.
node.content:
["There have been 35 new locations of interest added to the Ministry of Health's website as of 6pm tonight, including new locations in the Bay of Plenty.", "", "
At least five cases of Covid-19 have been found in Bay of Plenty. Photo: 123rf
", "Stuff is also reporting a possible case in Hawke's Bay tonight from a person who had permission to travel from Auckland.", "After several new cases in Bay of Plenty this week, the Ministry has revealed several locations of interest from this past week in Mount Maunganui, including the Astrolabe Brew Bar on 12 and 13 November, the iKandi adult club early on 13 November and Faded Barbershop on 12 November.", "Other locations announced today include the Northern Wairoa Golf Club and Countdown in Dargaville and Four Square in the beach settlement of Waipu in Northland.", "There is also a new site in Wellington, after a second positive test from a construction worker who had travelled to the capital from Auckland.", "People who visited Countdown Cable Car Lane in the central city on Tuesday night are being told to self-monitor.", "Parram Grocery Store in central Christchurch and Z petrol station on Brougham Street are also locations of interest after they were visited by a Covid-19 case late on Monday morning.", "The full list can be found on the Ministry website.", "A total of 172 new community cases were announced today, with 24 of them outside Auckland."]
